items.title: Noodweer in Marbella: training Feyenoord afgelast
items.summary: De selectie van Feyenoord zou zondagochtend een training afwerken in Marbella, maar vanwege het slechte weer in Zuid-Spanje gaat dat niet door. De selectie is naar binnen gegaan en werkt een training af in de gym.

items.title: Transfers Feyenoord: Carranza neemt afscheid van Feyenoord-fans
items.summary: Ook buiten de transferperiode om volgt VI het transfernieuws bij Feyenoord op de voet, ook omdat het sneller dan je denkt alweer januari is. De doelwitten van de Rotterdammers, duiding van de clubwatcher, of aandacht in buitenlandse media. We verzamelen alles hier.

items.title: Premier League buildup, EFL, Afcon last 16 and Paris derby ‚Äì matchday live
items.summary: ‚öΩ News, discussion and previews before Sunday‚Äôs action ‚öΩ Get in touch by emailing us here or comment BTL Europe now, starting with a round-up of Saturday‚Äôs action. Barcelona are now seven points clear in La Liga while there was an unusual amount of media interest in Strasbourg v Nice? Why? The hosts are managed by Liam Rosenior, the man heavily linked with the vacant Chelsea job. As well as being a Belle and Sebastian song, Jonathan David is now in the unfortunate group of players who have fluffed a Panenka penalty. His mishap cost Juventus victory in a 1-1 home draw with struggling Lecce. Continue reading...

items.title: Lack of spin bowling deprives fans of Ashes variety
items.summary: We have seen plenty of action throughout an Ashes series played in fast-forward - but not much in the way of frontline spin bowling.

items.title: Rice geeft 'masterclass' weg: 'Hij kan nog meer scoren'
items.summary: Declan Rice maakte zaterdag veel indruk tijdens de zege van Arsenal bij Bournemouth . Zo ook op Jermain Defoe, die Rice tot de beste middenvelders van Europa rekent.

items.title: Meteen heldenrol voor Benfica-debutant Cabral: 'Weet niet eens wat ik moet zeggen'
items.summary: Benfica had de nodige moeite met Estoril, maar dankzij Vangelis Pavlidis en invaller Sidny Lopes Cabral werd alsnog een ruime 3-1 overwinning geboekt. Pavlidis bleef na afloop van de wedstrijd nuchter, terwijl ook Cabral aan het woord kwam.

items.title: Miguel Rodr√≠guez aast op kortste weg naar Europa en eerste tastbare prijs
items.summary: Als het aan Miguel Rodr√≠guez ligt, gaat FC Utrecht dit seizoen vol voor de Eurojackpot KNVB-beker. De 22-jarige Spanjaard hoopt daarmee opnieuw Europa League-voetbal in de Domstad veilig te stellen.

items.title: 'Let's just see' - Cook responds to talk of England coaching role
items.summary: Sir Alastair Cook says there has been "zero contact" with England regarding a possible role on the coaching staff - but that he would like to work with the side at "some stage in my life".

items.title: Root and Brook stand has England on top in stormy Sydney
items.summary: Joe Root and Harry Brook shared in England's highest partnership of the series to put the tourists on top after a storm-affected first day of the fifth Ashes Test in Sydney.

items.title: Galaxy star Riqui Puig out until '27 after setback
items.summary: LA Galaxy star Riqui Puig's return from injury has been delayed until 2027, the LA Galaxy said Saturday after confirming that the midfielder underwent another anterior cruciate ligament reconstructive surgery on his left knee.

items.title: 'Unbelievable' Garc√≠a leads Bar√ßa to derby triumph
items.summary: Barcelona coach thanked Joan Garc√≠a for an unbelievable performance as the goalkeeper dealt with a hostile reception on his return to Espanyol to help the LaLiga leaders seal a 2-0 win at the RCDE Stadium on Saturday.

items.title: Amorim refuses to clarify 'time and money' claim
items.summary: Ruben Amorim has declined to expand on his claim that it will take "time and money" to make his system work at Manchester United.

items.title: Arteta: Match-winner Rice among world's best
items.summary: Mikel Arteta has hailed Declan Rice as one of the best midfielders in the world after playing a starring role in Arsenal's 3-2 win at Bournemouth.

items.title: Arsenal reaping the rewards of Rice adding goals to his game
items.summary: Declan Rice scored twice in Arsenal's win at Bournemouth on Saturday, and with goals added to his game, is he now the best midfielder in the world?

items.title: Ruben Amorim clamming up over transfer hopes suggests faultline
items.summary: Manchester United‚Äôs head coach appeared downbeat when questioned over not being able to acquire enough top players to suit his preferred formation Ruben Amorim offered a collector‚Äôs item on Friday ‚Äì a point-blank refusal to address a question that concerned an answer he previously gave. In doing so, he hinted at a disquiet concerning the club‚Äôs transfer policy. ‚ÄúYou said you‚Äôre starting to understand that to play 3-4-3, you [need] a lot of top players and that‚Äôs not possible. Can I ask why you never realised that when you first came into the club?‚Äù was the question put to Amorim in his press conference for United‚Äôs visit to Leeds on Sunday. Continue reading...

items.title: Amorim refuses to explain cryptic transfer comment
items.summary: Manchester United boss Ruben Amorim refuses to explain a cryptic comment about the club's transfer plans - hinting at friction behind the scenes.

items.title: Rice 'stretches himself to limit' before another 'masterclass'
items.summary: How injury doubt Declan Rice "stretched himself to the very limit" to take Arsenal six points clear at the top of the Premier League.

items.title: Mikel Arteta lauds Arsenal‚Äôs ‚Äòpersonality and presence‚Äô in win at Bournemouth
items.summary: Manager praises ‚Äòremarkable‚Äô Gabriel reaction after error Rice makes impact after disappointment of missing Villa Mikel Arteta paid tribute to Arsenal‚Äôs newfound ‚Äúpersonality and presence‚Äù after they came back from a goal down to defeat Bournemouth and move six points clear at the top of the Premier League. Gabriel Magalh√£es made up for his error in gifting Evanilson the opening goal by lashing in the equaliser at the other end minutes later before Declan Rice scored twice after returning from a knee injury. Eli Junior Kroupi pulled one back late on but Arsenal were able to comfortably hang on as they began the new year with a fifth straight league win. Continue reading...

items.title: 'Shocking, pathetic and embarrassing' - can Nuno save West Ham?
items.summary: For West Ham and Nuno Espirito Santo, the picture looks bleak. A hapless 3-0 defeat by bottom side Wolves on Saturday came as a stark reality check for the struggling Hammers.

items.title: Rice strikes twice as Arsenal beat Bournemouth
items.summary: Declan Rice scores twice, as Premier League leaders Arsenal come from behind to beat Bournemouth following early error.
